attributes.action: set up independant body to review the allowances of MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the revelation of allowable expences for MPs we implore the Prime Minister to set up an independant body of ordinary citizens to review the allowance that MPs can incure on second homes. Others have to commute and cannot invest in second homes at the expense of the taxpayer, why should elected officials be any different.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
